channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When will I know if my flight is canceled? Here’s what to expect as delays ripple across U.S. airports
item.description: Things will return to normal, eventually, but in time for Thanksgiving travel? That's not a given at this point.

item.title: This Russian Humanoid Robot Just Fell on Its Face During Its Debut
item.description: This isn’t the first humanoid robot to suffer an embarrassing glitch, and it won’t be the last.

item.title: Epstein email says Trump ‘knew about the girls’ as White House calls its release a Democratic smear
item.description: Democrats released emails referencing Trump, including a 2011 Epstein note saying Trump spent hours at his home with a sex trafficking victim.

item.title: Kennedy Heir Jack Schlossberg Just Announced He’s Running for Office. Would He Be Good for Business?
item.description: This would be the former Vogue correspondent’s first elected office.

item.title: Anthropic says new $50B investment in data centers will create about 800 permanent jobs and 2,400 construction jobs
item.description: The tech industry is moving forward investments to build energy-hungry AI infrastructure, despite bubble concerns.

item.title: Anthropic and Microsoft announce new AI data center projects in Texas, New York, and Georgia
item.description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic announced a $50 billion investment in computing infrastructure on Wednesday that will include new data cente...

item.title: By the numbers: How the government shutdown is impacting U.S. air travel
item.description: America’s aviation system is straining under the weight of the longest government shutdown on record: thousands of flight cancellations , long delays ...

item.title: Ford CEO Says He Was Shocked by What His Team Found When They Took Apart a Tesla
item.description: Jim Farley said that seeing the inside of a Tesla Model 3 led to some big changes at Ford.

item.title: Anxious About Climate Change? Take These Steps to Cope
item.description: Climate change is in the news during COP30. We’ve got tips to tackle your climate anxiety.

item.title: MSNBC is changing its name and embracing the ethos of a startup
item.description: Asked what viewers should expect when television’s MSNBC makes its corporate divorce from NBC News final this weekend, network president Rebecca Kutle...

item.title: This Wildly Popular Bike Brand Is on the Brink of Going Bust
item.description: The Seattle-based company was once valued at more than $1 billion.

item.title: Only one in 3 U.S. adults approve of the way Trump is managing the government, AP-NORC poll shows
item.description: The approval rating decline was driven in large part by Republicans and independents, the survey found.

item.title: Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey are getting AI voice clones with ElevenLabs
item.description: Oscar-winning actors Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey have made deals with voice-cloning company ElevenLabs that will allow its artificial intell...

item.title: The U.S. Mint ended production of the penny, citing cost savings and the coin’s fading relevance as its buying power—once enough for a snack or candy—has all but disappeared
item.description: “God bless America, and we’re going to save the taxpayers $56 million,” U.S. Treasurer Brandon Beach said just before hitting a button to strike the f...

item.title: During the government shutdown and SNAP pause, a lot more people turned to strangers to ask for loans
item.description: For many Americans, 2025 has been tough economically. Tariffs have raised the price of goods (from coffee to clothing), inflation is still rising, and...
